text: Olga Flor Olga Flor (born 25 January 1968) is an Austrian writer. == Life == Flor was born in Vienna. She grew up in Vienna, Cologne and Graz and studied physics and history at the University of Graz. She has worked for multimedia enterprises, written several books and received literary awards like the Anton Wildgans Prize in 2013. She's a member of the Grazer Autorenversammlung. ==Works== * Erlkönig, 2002 * Talschluss, 2005 * Kollateralschaden, 2008 * Die Königin ist tot, 2012 * Ich in Gelb, 2015 * Klartraum, 2017 * Politik der Emotion, 2018 == References == ==External links== *www.olgaflor.at (Archive) * DNB Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Vienna Category:Austrian writers Category:Anton Wildgans Prize winners Category:University of Graz alumni
title: Olga Flor
